alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Fall River; Oglala Lakota; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 07 at 1:19PM MDT until October 08 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...The Fall River County Plains, Oglala Lakota County, Bennett County, Todd County and Tripp County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Fall River; Oglala Lakota; Todd; Tripp
